snippet: Maybe the end of the "Oil Age" is now approaching, and the Saudis have understood this better than Western oilmen.
lead_paragraph: Maybe the end of the "Oil Age" is now approaching, and the Saudis have understood this better than Western oilmen.

headline.main: Saudi Hints on Pricing Offer Warning for Oil Companies
